articles.title: New York Mets starter Jacob deGrom continues 'to take care of business,' wins in Citi Field return
articles.description: Jacob deGrom struck out 12 and carried a perfect game into the sixth inning of his second start all season, pitching the New York Mets past the Atlanta Braves 5-2 on Sunday for their 12th victory in 14 games.

articles.title: Seattle Storm celebrate Sue Bird in final regular-season home game; Aces play spoiler
articles.description: A franchise-record crowd of more than 18,000 packed Climate Pledge Arena to celebrate Sue Bird in her final regular-season home game.

articles.title: 'Emotional' Nick Kyrgios ends three-year title drought, tops Yoshihito Nishioka at Citi Open
articles.description: Wimbledon runner-up Nick Kyrgios ended a three-year title drought by claiming the trophy at the site of his last triumph, saving the only break point he faced in the Citi Open final Sunday along the way to a 6-4, 6-3 victory over Yoshihito Nishioka.
